key.name: development-tools
key.summary: Enable internal tools useful for developers and testers from Alt-F2
key.description: Allows access to internal debugging and monitoring tools using the Alt-F2 dialog.

key.name: enabled-extensions
key.description: Cinnamon extensions have a uuid property; this key lists extensions which should be loaded. disabled-extensions overrides this setting for extensions that appear in both lists.

key.name: enabled-applets
key.description: Cinnamon applets have a uuid property; this key lists applets which should be loaded.

key.name: next-applet-id
key.summary: The next applet id to give the next added applet
key.description: Do not change manually.

key.name: next-desklet-id
key.summary: The next desklet id to give the next added desklet
key.description: Do not change manually.

key.name: enabled-desklets
key.description: Cinnamon desklets have a uuid property; this key lists desklets which should be loaded. uuids should be put in the form uuid:id:x:y, where id is used to distinguish between multiple instances of the same desklet

key.name: desklet-snap
key.summary: Whether desklets "snap" to a grid position
key.description: Enabling this allows desklets' position to be snapped into a regular grid

key.name: desklet-snap-interval
key.summary: The interval between each possible grid position when desklets "snap"
key.description: If desklet-snap is enabled, the possible positions of desklets will be all integer multiples of the value of "desklet-snap-size"

key.name: panel-autohide
key.description: Whether the panel autohides or not.

key.name: panel-show-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before a hidden panel is shown
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: panel-hide-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before a shown panel is hidden
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: panel2-autohide
key.description: Whether the panel autohides or not.

key.name: panel2-show-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before a hidden panel is shown
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: panel2-hide-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before a shown panel is hidden
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: panel-resizable
key.description: Whether the panel uses a user-defined height

key.name: panel-top-height
key.description: User-defined panel-height for top panel

key.name: panel-bottom-height
key.description: User-defined panel-height for bottom panel

key.name: panel-scale-text-icons
key.summary: Scale panel applet text and icons
key.description: Whether the panel icons and text from applets is resized according to the custom panel height

key.name: dnd-drag-threshold
key.description: Amount of motion to ignore before registering a drag-and-drop intent on panel objects

key.name: keyboard-applet-use-flags
key.summary: Use flags to display the keyboard layouts
key.description: Whether to use flags to display the keyboard layouts.

key.name: desktop-effects
key.description: Whether to enable desktop effects and window animations.

key.name: desktop-effects-on-dialogs
key.summary: Enable desktop effects on dialog boxes
key.description: Whether to enable desktop effects on dialog boxes.

key.name: desktop-effects-close-effect
key.description: An effect: scale, fade, none

key.name: desktop-effects-close-transition
key.description: A Tweener transition

key.name: desktop-effects-close-time
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: desktop-effects-map-effect
key.description: An effect: scale, fade, none

key.name: desktop-effects-map-transition
key.description: A Tweener transition

key.name: desktop-effects-map-time
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: desktop-effects-minimize-effect
key.description: An effect: traditional, scale, fade, none

key.name: desktop-effects-minimize-transition
key.description: A Tweener transition

key.name: desktop-effects-minimize-time
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: desktop-effects-maximize-effect
key.description: An effect: none

key.name: desktop-effects-maximize-transition
key.description: A Tweener transition

key.name: desktop-effects-maximize-time
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: desktop-effects-unmaximize-effect
key.description: An effect: none

key.name: desktop-effects-unmaximize-transition
key.description: A Tweener transition

key.name: desktop-effects-unmaximize-time
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: desktop-layout
key.description: Layout styles: traditional (1 panel at the bottom), flipped (1 panel on top), classic (1 panel on top, 1 panel at the bottom)

key.name: date-format
key.description: Format used for dates.

key.name: menu-text
key.description: The text shown in the Menu label.

key.name: menu-icon
key.description: The icon shown in the Menu button.

key.name: menu-hover-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before which a category is selected when it is hovered
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: activate-menu-applet-on-hover
key.summary: Enable or disable activation menu applet on hover
key.description: Another way to open the menu by just hovering the mouse pointer as opposed to clicking on it.

key.name: menu-enable-autoscroll
key.summary: Enable or disable autoscrolling in application list
key.description: Toggles the auto-scrolling regions at the top and bottom of the app list

key.name: display-notifications
key.summary: Whether notifications are to be displayed

key.name: menu-show-places
key.summary: Enable or disable display of places in menu applet
key.description: Toggles displaying the 'Places' category in the menu applet

key.name: menu-show-recent
key.summary: Enable or disable display of recent files in menu applet
key.description: Toggles displaying the 'Recent files' category in the menu applet

key.name: menu-search-filesystem
key.summary: Enable or disable filesystem path entry in search box
key.description: Toggles whether pressing TAB within the search box autocompletes paths within the filesystem. Matches are also shown in the application list and can be clicked to open with default handler.

key.name: number-workspaces
key.summary: Number of workspaces in Cinnamon session
key.description: Number of Workspaces

key.name: overview-corner
key.description: Properties of overview corners, in the form functionality:hover:icon. The order in which properties are displayed is top left, top right, bottom left, bottom right.

key.name: expo-applet-hover
key.description: Whether the expo applet triggers only when you click, or when you hover on it

key.name: scale-applet-hover
key.description: Whether the scale applet triggers only when you click, or when you hover on it

key.name: panel-launchers
key.summary: Desktop files of the applications to put in the panel launchers applet
key.description: Cinnamon allows to show applications launchers on the panel. This key lists the desktop files of the applications to show there.

key.name: enable-app-monitoring
key.summary: Whether to collect stats about applications usage
key.description: Cinnamon normally monitors active applications in order to present the most used ones (e.g. in launchers). While this data will be kept private, you may want to disable this for privacy reasons. Please note that doing so won't remove already saved data.

key.name: favorite-apps
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for favorite applications
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the favorites area.

key.name: workspace-name-overrides
key.description: The user-set names of the workspaces.

key.name: workspace-osd-duration
key.description: Duration of the OSD (in milliseconds)

key.name: workspace-osd-x
key.summary: Workspace horizontal position (in percent of the monitor's width)
key.description: Workspace horizontal position (in percent of the monitor's width)

key.name: workspace-osd-y
key.summary: Workspace vertical position (in percent of the monitor's height)
key.description: Workspace vertical position (in percent of the monitor's height)

key.name: workspace-osd-visible
key.summary: Enable or disable the workspace OSD
key.description: Whether the name of the workspace shows up on the screen when activated or not.

key.name: enable-looking-glass-logs
key.summary: Enable or disable sending Looking Glass global.log output to file
key.description: Whether looking glass log data is written to the file: ~/.cinnamon/glass.log or not

key.name: workspace-expo-view-as-grid
key.summary: Display the Expo view as a grid
key.description: When enabled the Expo view will be displayed as a grid.

key.name: looking-glass-history
key.summary: History for the looking glass dialog

key.name: panel-edit-mode
key.description: A mode for the user to drag and drop applets and modify the look of the desktop

key.name: alttab-switcher-style
key.description: Controls the style of the ALT-tab window switcher. Can be any combination of "icons", "preview" and "thumbnails", separated by "+".

key.name: alttab-switcher-enforce-primary-monitor
key.summary: Enforce displaying the alt-tab switcher on the primary monitor instead of the active one

key.name: window-list-applet-scroll
key.description: When enabled the mouse wheel can scroll through the items in the window list applet.

key.name: bring-windows-to-current-workspace
key.summary: Brings windows requiring attention to the current workspace
key.description: When enabled, if a window requires attention, it is brought to the current workspace.

key.name: desklet-decorations
key.summary: The decoration level of the desklets
key.description: The amount of decoration desklets must have. 0 = None; 1 = Borders; 2 = Borders and header;

key.name: edge-flip-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before switching the workspace
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: cinnamon-settings-advanced
key.summary: Whether advanced mode is enabled in cinnamon-settings

key.name: run-dialog-show-completions
key.summary: Whether or not to show possible completions in the run dialog (Alt-F2)

key.name: enable-vfade
key.summary: Enable the fade effect in Cinnamon scrollviews
key.description: Whether the vfade effect is enabled or not

key.name: name
key.description: The name of the theme

key.name: keyboard-type
key.description: The type of keyboard to use.

key.name: power-label
key.description: Display battery remaining as percentage or time in power applet.

key.name: show-weekdate
key.summary: Show the week date in the calendar
key.description: If true, display the ISO week date in the calendar.

key.name: date-format
key.summary: Format for the date in the panel
key.description: Format used to show the date in the panel.

key.name: date-format-full
key.summary: Format for the date in the applet menu
key.description: Format used to show the date in the applet menu.

key.name: framerate
key.description: The framerate of the resulting screencast recordered by Cinnamon's screencast recorder in frames-per-second.

key.name: pipeline
key.summary: The gstreamer pipeline used to encode the screencast
key.description: Sets the GStreamer pipeline used to encode recordings. It follows the syntax used for gst-launch. The pipeline should have an unconnected sink pad where the recorded video is recorded. It will normally have a unconnected source pad; output from that pad will be written into the output file. However the pipeline can also take care of its own output - this might be used to send the output to an icecast server via shout2send or similar. When unset or set to an empty value, the default pipeline will be used. This is currently 'videorate ! vp8enc quality=10 speed=2 threads=%T ! queue ! webmmux' and records to WEBM using the VP8 codec. %T is used as a placeholder for a guess at the optimal thread count on the system.

key.name: file-extension
key.summary: File extension used for storing the screencast
key.description: The filename for recorded screencasts will be a unique filename based on the current date, and use this extension. It should be changed when recording to a different container format.

key.name: custom-keybindings-to-3-6
key.summary: Run-once flag to see if custom keybindings have been converted to gsettings
key.description: Run-once flag to see if custom keybindings have been converted to gsettings

key.name: attach-modal-dialogs
key.summary: Attach modal dialog to the parent window
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.muffin when running Cinnamon.

key.name: button-layout
key.summary: Arrangement of buttons on the titlebar
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.desktop.wm.preferences when running Cinnamon.

key.name: edge-tiling
key.summary: Enable edge tiling when dropping windows on screen edges
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.muffin when running Cinnamon.

key.name: workspace-cycle
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.cinnamon.muffin when running Cinnamon.

key.name: workspaces-only-on-primary
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.muffin when running Cinnamon.

key.name: mode
key.description: This key defines the whether the desktop background shows one single wallpaper, a slideshow or an online slideshow (Flickr).

key.name: slideshow-folder
key.summary: Folder to use for the slideshow
key.description: This key defines the folder to use for the slideshow.

key.name: slideshow-recursive
key.summary: Whether to list files recursively for the slideshow
key.description: This key defines whether to list files recursively for the slideshow.

key.name: slideshow-delay
key.description: This key defines the delay for the slideshow.

key.name: default-message
key.description: This is the message that appears on the lock screen by default.

key.name: ask-for-away-message
key.summary: Whether to ask for an away message when locking the screen
key.description: Whether to ask for an away message when locking the screen.

key.name: date-format
key.summary: The date format for the clock desklet
key.description: The format to be used in the clock desklet

key.name: font-size
key.summary: The font size for the clock deskelt
key.description: The font size to be used to display the time on the clock desklet

key.name: launcher-list
key.summary: Desktop files of the applications to be shown on desktop
key.description: The "launchers" desklet provides a method to show a launcher on the desktop This list maps the desklet id to the desktop file of application.

key.name: custom-list
key.summary: List of gsettings custom keybinding paths to look in

key.name: name
key.description: Name of the custom binding

key.name: binding
key.description: Binding for the custom binding

key.name: command
key.description: Command to run when the binding is invoked
